column3: This punishment of mine is shaping up to be rather exciting! I only thought to sate my intellectual curiosity, you see, but I ended up crossing a line. Or two. Or three...
Bring me anything curious, anything more unnatural than usual, and I'll tell you what it truly is. I delight in all discoveries, but let us hope for something <Emphasis>spicy</Emphasis>!
Appraise a piece of the Accursed or Blessed Hoard.
They may be ruins now, but the churches of the First Light were once abustle with parishioners and pilgrims. And where people have been, so have their belongings!
Among the bits and bobs fallen from loose pockets must hide treasure─treasure from a sanctum's vault, perhaps! Does not the mere thought of it make your fingers itch?
When exploring the deep dungeon, players will, on occasion, find pieces of the Accursed Hoard─treasure abandoned by pilgrims of eld.
You can ascertain the value of pieces found in Pilgrim's Traverse by presenting them to Tyr Marn for appraisal.

Blessings come in all sorts─in golds and riches, in jewels and glass, in the ruddy cheeks of a smiling babe... The very flow of time that brought you to this moment may in itself be providence. Even a simple stone can be a blessing to some!
The significance of any item is bestowed by its holder, after all. And it, in turn, blesses us with knowledge of its former masters. Such very sweet knowledge, indeed... <slurp>
By completing objectives in your challenge log, you may earn pieces of the Blessed Hoard. Speak with Vanthau to consult the challenge log category for Pilgrim's Traverse.
You can receive special items from pieces of the Blessed Hoard by presenting them to Tyr Marn for appraisal.
